martinez.name: Chief Martinez

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: Welcome to Power Plant Alpha, CyberGuard team. I'm Chief Martinez, the plant manager here.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: Before you face any threats, you need to understand what we're protecting.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: ICS stands for Industrial Control Systems - they're the backbone of critical infrastructure.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: Unlike IT systems that prioritize confidentiality, OT systems prioritize AVAILABILITY. If this plant goes down, people lose power.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: SCADA, DCS, PLCs - these aren't just acronyms. They're the systems keeping civilization running.

initial.speaker: CIPHER
initial.text: The logs don't lie. We need to understand these systems to protect them.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: Exactly. Talk to my team - Park and Santos. They'll teach you the technical details.

initial.speaker: Chief Martinez
initial.text: Once you've learned from everyone, you'll be ready to face whatever's lurking in our systems.

repeat.speaker: Chief Martinez
repeat.text: Remember: ICS prioritizes availability. Keep those systems running.

repeat.speaker: Chief Martinez
repeat.text: Have you talked to Park and Santos yet? They have important information.

keyLessons: SCADA, DCS, PLCs are critical ICS components

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: Hey there! I'm Park, the control room operator. Let me show you the basics!

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: See this panel? That's an HMI - Human Machine Interface. It's how we monitor and control the plant.

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: But the real magic happens with PLCs - Programmable Logic Controllers.

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: PLCs are like the brains of the operation. They read sensor data and control physical processes.

initial.speaker: BLAZE
initial.text: Containment first, questions later! What happens if a PLC gets compromised?

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: Good question! A compromised PLC could open valves, stop pumps, or even cause physical damage.

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: That's why ICS security is so critical. We're not just protecting data - we're protecting physical processes.

initial.speaker: Technician Park
initial.text: Remember: PLCs control the physical world. Protect them at all costs!

repeat.speaker: Technician Park
repeat.text: PLCs read sensors, make decisions, and control actuators. It's a continuous loop!

repeat.speaker: Technician Park
repeat.text: The HMI shows us what's happening. If it's compromised, we might not see the real truth.

santos.name: Dr. Santos

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: Ah, the CyberGuard team. I'm Dr. Santos, process engineer. Let me explain what's at stake.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: Power plants, water treatment, oil refineries - they all use ICS/SCADA systems.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: An attack on these systems isn't just a data breach. It can have PHYSICAL consequences.

initial.speaker: GHOST
initial.text: I've been on the other side. Trust me, attackers know how valuable these targets are.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: Indeed. Remember Ukraine 2015? Attackers took down the power grid. 230,000 people lost electricity.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: Or Oldsmar 2021 - someone tried to poison a water supply by changing chemical levels remotely.

initial.speaker: VOLT
initial.text: That's not how it works in the real world. We need defense in depth.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: Exactly! Safety systems, network segmentation, monitoring - layers of protection.

initial.speaker: Dr. Santos
initial.text: You've learned well. The boss arena should be unlocked now. Good luck, CyberGuard.

repeat.speaker: Dr. Santos
repeat.text: Ukraine 2015, Oldsmar 2021 - these attacks are real. Learn from history.

repeat.speaker: Dr. Santos
repeat.text: Defense in depth: multiple layers of security to protect critical processes.

keyLessons: ICS attacks can cause physical damage

boss.name: GLITCH
boss.title: The Script Kiddie

introDDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
introDDialogue.text: Well, well, well... the famous CyberGuard team.

introDDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
introDDialogue.text: I'm GLITCH! The Null Syndicate's newest recruit. Sure, I'm just getting started...

introDDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
introDDialogue.text: But I've learned enough to mess with your precious power plant!

introDDialogue.speaker: CIPHER
introDDialogue.text: A script kiddie? You're using other people's tools without understanding them.

introDDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
introDDialogue.text: Hey! I know plenty! Let's see if YOU know your ICS basics. Answer wrong and suffer!

victoryDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
victoryDialogue.text: No... impossible! How did you know all that?!

victoryDialogue.speaker: CIPHER
victoryDialogue.text: The logs don't lie. You never stood a chance against real knowledge.

victoryDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
victoryDialogue.text: This isn't over! The Null Syndicate has bigger plans... you'll see!

victoryDialogue.speaker: VOLT
victoryDialogue.text: Power Plant Alpha is secure. One city down, more to go.

victoryDialogue.speaker: BLAZE
victoryDialogue.text: Good work team! But this was just a script kiddie. The real threats are still out there.

defeatDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
defeatDialogue.text: Ha! Not so smart after all, are you?

defeatDialogue.speaker: GLITCH
defeatDialogue.text: Go back and study some more. I'll be waiting...
